channel.title: СМИ on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Скоро появится Amazon Kindle для газет
item.description: Big-Screen e-Readers May Help Save Newspapers - NYTimes.com But it is Amazon, maker of the Kindle, that appears to be first in line to try throwing an electronic life preserver to old-media companies. As early as this week, according to people briefed on the online retailer’s plans, Amazon will introduce a larger version of its Kindle wireless device tailored for displaying newspapers, magazines and perhaps textbooks. An Amazon spokesman would not comment, but some news organizations, including The New York Times, are expected to be involved in the introduction of the device, according to people briefed on the plans.
